Header: SFHQ-J Initiative Gets Exclusive ‘Jack Park’ in Palaly
Content: Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) in coordination with the Lions Club 306 B2 and Hadabima Authority after entering into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) has allocated nearly 10 acres inside the Palaly Army cantonment for cultivation of more than 500 Jack saplings, in the so called ‘Kos Park’ (Jackfruit Park) reserved exclusively for this purpose in the peninsula. After Brigadier Ajith Elwatte, Brigadier Army Quartering (BAQ) at the SFHQ-J on behalf of the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi, signed the MoU with Lion Dr. M Ramajeyam, the District Governor of Lions District 306 B2 on Monday (3) to this effect, troops are expected to plant those saplings in the park shortly. The International President of the Lions Club, Mrs. Gudrun Yngvadottir was also present during the occasion.
